pages.text: Regular updates will typically contain things like balance changes, new ships and new abilities / spells. Note that I've never made anything like this before, so balance changes may be frequent since I really have no clue how to properly balance things..

These updates may also contain community suggested additions or changes. If you ever feel like creating a ship for this game, have a look at $(l:naval_warfare:contribution/designing_ships)Designing Ships/$ (no guarantees that it'll be added).
